topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55ab29e6636872607200018d#post_55ab29e6636872607200018d
Here's the thing though; more than likely we're going to find alien life in the next thirty years.

The reasons being is that there's a long term probe development for studying Europa.  Europa more than likely has life because it has a ocean and all the ingredients.  While it's unlikely we'll find sapient life we'll still more than likely find bacteria or potentially multicellular organisms like Krill or fish or something.
